changelog:
- Updates script to include patch4 so vanilla stays up to date
- Adds 'proper' intro cutscenes to each spawn
- Adds basic online version of mod (Not great) in SMF options
- Restores Chinese translations (With help from suanjiansalt) 
- Makes lethal pills reachable 
- Unlocks other agency pickup 
- Replaces manual depends with SMF depends to reduce 'warning' messages
